Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure information security policies are in place and reviewed regularly.

Requirements.Description: Ensure that the AWS account's contact information is current and registered.
Requirements.Name: Organization of Information Security

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure current contact details and security contact information is registered for the AWS account.

Requirements.Description: Ensure the security of AWS user accounts by enforcing strong password policies.
Requirements.Name: Human Resource Security

Attributes.Check_Summary: Enforce password policies that require strong passwords, periodic rotation, and prevent reuse.

Requirements.Description: Ensure that the AWS account's contact information is current and registered.
Requirements.Name: Asset Management

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure current contact details and security contact information is registered for the AWS account.

Requirements.Description: Ensure that access to AWS resources is controlled and monitored.
Requirements.Name: Access Control

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure IAM Access Analyzer is enabled and no findings are reported.

Requirements.Description: Ensure encryption mechanisms are in place to protect AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: Cryptography

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure ACM certificates are valid, transparency logs are enabled, KMS key rotation is enabled, and S3 bucket KMS encryption is in place.

Requirements.Description: Ensure physical and environmental security measures are in place to protect AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: Physical and Environmental Security

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure physical access to AWS resources is controlled and monitored.

Requirements.Description: Ensure operational security measures are in place to protect AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: Operations Security

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled, integrated with CloudWatch Logs, multi-region, backup plans are in place, and various CloudWatch log metric filters are configured.

Requirements.Description: Ensure secure communication channels are used for AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: Communications Security

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure SSL is enabled for API Gateway, CloudFront distributions use HTTPS, RDS instance transport is encrypted, and EKS cluster network policies are enforced.

Requirements.Description: Ensure system acquisition, development and maintenance measures are in place to protect AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: System Acquisition, Development and Maintenance

Attributes.Category: A.14 System Acquisition, Development and Maintenance
Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure software development lifecycle includes security requirements, and vulnerabilities are managed.

Requirements.Description: Ensure supplier relationships are managed and monitored.
Requirements.Name: Supplier Relationships

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure AWS Config is enabled in all regions.

Requirements.Description: Ensure effective incident management processes are in place for AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: Incident Management

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure GuardDuty is enabled and there are no high severity findings.

Requirements.Description: Ensure information security aspects are included in business continuity management.
Requirements.Name: Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity Management

Attributes.Category: A.17 Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity Management
Attributes.Objective_Name: Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity Management
Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure backup and disaster recovery mechanisms are in place and regularly tested.

Requirements.Description: Ensure compliance with security policies and regulatory requirements for AWS resources.
Requirements.Name: Compliance

Attributes.Check_Summary: Ensure root account usage is avoided, access keys are rotated every 90 days, and no root access keys exist.
